title: 2026 Spring Registration Now Open!
content: Registration for the Spring 2026 season is now open. Sign up before February 15th to secure your spot on the team!

title: Season Opener Victory
content: TDFC kicked off the season with an impressive 3-1 victory against City FC. Great team performance!

title: Team Practice Schedule
content: Team practices will be held every Tuesday and Thursday at 6:00 PM at Central Park Field. All players welcome!
